Class SearchMenu

java.lang.Object
  Menu
      SearchMenu

public class SearchMenu
extends Menu

Search menu of the store terminal.
This menu including following menu options:
Search item by name
Search items by price
Search gift by name
Search gifts by points value
Search customer by name

Author:
Xu Waycell, Way Studios
See Also:
SearchItemByNameAction, SearchItemsByPriceAction, SearchGiftByNameAction, SearchGiftsByPointsValueAction, SearchCustomerByNameAction
